text: William C. McDonald was an American Democratic Party politician who served as governor of new Mexico from 1912 to 1917. During his tenure a number of labor laws were introduced.Title: Labor Legislation of 1912 : Bulletin of the United States Bureau of Labor Statistics, No. 111, P.158-168Title: Labor Legislation of 1915 : Bulletin of the United States Bureau of Labor Statistics, No. 186, P.249-250 ==References== Category:Governors of New Mexico Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: William C. McDonald (governor)
